Queries.Name: mssql_process_status
Queries.Query: SELECT status, COUNT(*) count FROM sys.sysprocesses GROUP BY status
Queries.Description: Counts the number of processes per status

Queries.Name: mssql_process_connections
Queries.Query: SELECT ISNULL(DB_NAME(dbid), 'other') as dbname, COUNT(dbid) as connections FROM sys.sysprocesses WHERE dbid > 0 GROUP BY dbid
Queries.Description: Counts the number of connections per db

Queries.Name: mssql_deadlocks
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name = 'Number of Deadlocks/sec' AND instance_name = '_Total'
Queries.Description: Number of lock requests per second that resulted in a deadlock since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_cache_hit_ratio
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name = 'Buffer cache hit ratio'

Queries.Name: mssql_page_life_expectancy
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name = 'Page life expectancy'

Queries.Name: mssql_cpu_usage
Queries.Query: SELECT record_id, event_time, SQLProcessUtilization, SystemIdle, 100 - SystemIdle - SQLProcessUtilization AS OtherProcessUtilization FROM sys.dm_os_ring_buffers WHERE ring_buffer_type = N'RING_BUFFER_SCHEDULER_MONITOR' AND record_id = (SELECT MAX(record_id) FROM sys.dm_os_ring_buffers WHERE ring_buffer_type = N'RING_BUFFER_SCHEDULER_MONITOR')

Queries.Name: mssql_memory_usage
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name = 'Total Server Memory (KB)'
Queries.Description: Total memory used by SQL Server

Queries.Name: mssql_io_stall
Queries.Query: SELECT database_id, file_id, io_stall_read_ms, io_stall_write_ms, io_stall_total_ms, num_of_reads, num_of_writes, num_of_bytes_read, num_of_bytes_written FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(NULL, NULL)

Queries.Name: mssql_active_connections
Queries.Query: SELECT DB_NAME(dbid) as database_name, COUNT(dbid) as active_connections FROM sys.sysprocesses WHERE dbid > 0 AND status = 'runnable' OR status = 'running' GROUP BY dbid
Queries.Description: Counts the number of active connections per database

Queries.Name: mssql_kill_connection_errors
Queries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) as kill_connection_errors FROM sys.dm_exec_requests WHERE status = 'killed/rollback'
Queries.Description: Counts the number of kill connection errors

Queries.Name: mssql_io_stall_total
Queries.Query: SELECT SUM(io_stall_read_ms + io_stall_write_ms) as io_stall_total FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(NULL, NULL)

Queries.Name: mssql_batch_requests
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value as batch_requests FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name = 'Batch Requests/sec'
Queries.Description: Number of batch requests per second

Queries.Name: mssql_page_fault_count
Queries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) as page_fault_count FROM sys.dm_os_memory_cache_clock_hands

Queries.Name: mssql_memory_utilization_percentage
Queries.Query: SELECT (total_physical_memory_kb - available_physical_memory_kb) * 100.0 / total_physical_memory_kb as memory_utilization_percentage FROM sys.dm_os_sys_memory

Queries.Name: mssql_total_page_file_kb
Queries.Description: Total page file size in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_available_page_file_kb
Queries.Description: Available page file size in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_user_errors
Queries.Query: SELECT COUNT(*) as user_errors FROM sys.dm_os_ring_buffers WHERE ring_buffer_type = 'RING_BUFFER_EXCEPTION'
Queries.Description: Counts the number of user errors
